name: Discovery Kids: Kitten Corner
description:
Nintendo.com Description (from Ad Blurbs)



Kitten Corner lets you raise your very own kitten on the Nintendo DS. Choose your favorite breeds and coloring, give them a name and begin playing with them right away! You can buy accessories, toys, and furniture for your new friend... you can even enter your kitten into competitions and prove that your kitten is the best around!

Features

• Customize your cuddly kittens with over 35 unlockable fur colors and markings• Visit the veterinarian center to keep your cat in good health• Take your kitten through 15 unique and challenging levels along with 20 different minigames• Enter your kitten in local contests to win awards
